channel.title: Configuring ALUA Using Helm on Huawei
channel.description: Recent content in Configuring ALUA Using Helm on Huawei

item.title: Configuring ALUA Parameters for a Huawei Enterprise Storage Backend
item.description: For details about how to configure ALUA for Huawei enterprise storage, see the host connectivity guide of the corresponding product. The ALUA configuration may vary according to the OS. Visit Huawei Technical Support, enter Host Connectivity Guide in the search box, and click the search button. In the search result, select the host connectivity guide for the desired OS. Configure ALUA according to the actual situation and the description in the guide.

item.title: Configuring ALUA Parameters for a Distributed Storage Backend
item.description: For details about how to configure ALUA for Huawei distributed storage, see the host connectivity guide of the corresponding product. The ALUA configuration may vary according to the OS. Visit Huawei Technical Support, enter Host Connectivity Guide in the search box, and click the search button. In the search result, select the host connectivity guide for the desired OS. Configure ALUA according to the actual situation and the description in the guide.
